title: Common Questions
text: Bottled water is sold in the Visitor Center. Picnic lunches are allowed and there are a number of local eating places and sources for takeaway food. A number of Tour Companies include the Locks. Other options are Seattle Metro buses or Urber. If you want to experience the Locks from a boat, try Argosy Cruises. getting to the locks w/o a car? food and drinks at the locks? The small locks are closed for 2 weeks in March. The large locks are closed for 2 or more weeks in November, check the News & Updates page for Army Corps Official News Releases and Facebook.
